original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.92. Sanidassanattika, Niyyānikaduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ niyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika niyyānika duka  anidassana appaṭigham niyyānikam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na niyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Section on the Triad of the Conditions

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham aniyyānikam dhammam paccayā na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na aniyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
